low-tech.translation[0].definitions[0].d: not using the most modern machines or methods in business or industry
low-tech.translation[0].definitions[0].e: He made low-tech, budget space movies.
low-tech.translation[1].definitions[0].d: not using the most modern machines or methods in business or industry
low-tech.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Waste management, traditionally a low-tech industry, is being turned by the development of new technologies into something closer to chemical engineering.
